queries:
--create output table with companies
--cast timestamp to date
CREATE TABLE "out_company"
AS
  SELECT DISTINCT
    "Id"                                  AS "company_id",
    "Name"                                AS "company",
    "Website"                             AS "website",
    to_date("CreatedDate") :: VARCHAR(10) AS "date_created"
  FROM "account"
  WHERE "IsDeleted" = 'false';

--fake row to keep referential integrity if child tables are missing existing company ids
INSERT INTO "out_company"
  ("company_id", "company", "website", "date_created")
VALUES
  ('0', 'Unknown', '', '');
configuration.name: Company

queries:
--create output table with products
CREATE TABLE "out_product"
AS
  SELECT
    "Id"     AS "product_id",
    "Name"   AS "product",
    "Family" AS "product_family"
  FROM "product";
configuration.name: Product

queries:
--contract table
CREATE TABLE "out_contract"
AS
    SELECT
        "o"."Id"            			AS "contract_id",
        "o"."AccountId"     			AS "company_id",
        ifnull("e"."employee_id", '0')	AS "employee_id",
        "o"."Name"          			AS "contract",
        "o"."OrderNumber"   			AS "contract_number",
        "o"."EffectiveDate" 			AS "contract_start_date",
        "o"."EndDate"       			AS "contract_end_date",
        "o"."Status"					AS "status"
    FROM "order" "o"
             LEFT JOIN "employee" "e"
                       ON "o"."OwnerId" = "e"."employee_id"
    WHERE "o"."IsDeleted" = 'false';

--contract lines table
CREATE TABLE "out_contract_line"
AS
    SELECT
        "i"."Id"                                                             AS "contract_line_id",
        "o"."Id"                                                             AS "contract_id",
        "i"."Product2Id"                                                     AS "product_id",
        IFF("i"."ServiceDate" <> '', "i"."ServiceDate", "o"."EffectiveDate") AS "contract_line_start_date",
        IFF("i"."EndDate" <> '', "i"."EndDate", "o"."EndDate")               AS "contract_line_end_date",
        "i"."Quantity"                                                       AS "contract_line_quantity",
        "i"."UnitPrice"/8.76                                                 AS "contract_line_unit_price",
        "i"."CurrencyIsoCode"                                                AS "contract_line_currency"
    FROM "order" "o"
             INNER JOIN "order_item" "i"
                  		ON "o"."Id" = "i"."OrderId"
    WHERE "o"."IsDeleted" = 'false';
configuration.name: Contracts

queries:
--create output table with employees
CREATE TABLE "out_employee"
AS
  SELECT
    "Id"    AS "employee_id",
    "Name"  AS "employee",
    "Email" AS "email",
    "Title" AS "position"
  FROM "user";

--fake row to keep referential integrity if child tables are missing existing employee ids
INSERT INTO "out_employee"
  ("employee_id", "employee", "email", "position")
VALUES
  ('0', 'Unknown', '', '');
configuration.name: Employee

queries:
-- Aggregation
CREATE TABLE "tmp_mrr_aggregated"
AS
    SELECT
        "c"."company_id",
        "m"."date",
        "m"."contract_line_currency",
        SUM("m"."contract_line_quantity" * "m"."contract_line_unit_price")                   AS "gross_mrr",
        SUM("m"."previous_contract_line_quantity" * "m"."previous_contract_line_unit_price") AS "previous_gross_mrr"
    FROM "mrr" "m"
             LEFT JOIN "contract_line" "l"
                       ON "m"."contract_line_id" = "l"."contract_line_id"
             LEFT JOIN "contract" "c"
                       ON "l"."contract_id" = "c"."contract_id"
    GROUP BY 1, 2, 3;

-- Add changes and flags
CREATE TABLE "out_mrr_aggregated"
AS
    SELECT
        "company_id" || '_' || "date"      AS "mrr_aggregated_id",
        *,
        "gross_mrr" - "previous_gross_mrr" AS "gross_mrr_change",
        (CASE
             WHEN "gross_mrr" = 0 AND "previous_gross_mrr" > 0
                 THEN 'Churn'
             WHEN "gross_mrr" > 0 AND "previous_gross_mrr" = 0
                 THEN 'Net New'
             WHEN "gross_mrr" > "previous_gross_mrr"
                 THEN 'Upgrade'
             WHEN "gross_mrr" < "previous_gross_mrr"
                 THEN 'Downgrade'
             ELSE 'No Change'
         END)                              AS "gross_action",
        (CASE
             WHEN "gross_mrr" = 0 AND "previous_gross_mrr" > 0
                 THEN -1
             WHEN "gross_mrr" > 0 AND "previous_gross_mrr" = 0
                 THEN 1
             ELSE 0
         END)                              AS "count_change"
    FROM "tmp_mrr_aggregated";
configuration.name: MRR - Aggregation

queries:
--account table
CREATE TABLE "account_tmp"
AS
    SELECT
        OBJECT_CONSTRUCT(*) AS "obj"
    FROM "account";

CREATE TABLE "out_account"
AS
    SELECT
        trim("obj":"Id", '"')          AS "Id",
        trim("obj":"IsDeleted", '"')   AS "IsDeleted",
        trim("obj":"Name", '"')        AS "Name",
        trim("obj":"Website", '"')     AS "Website",
        trim("obj":"CreatedDate", '"') AS "CreatedDate"
    FROM "account_tmp";

--user table
CREATE TABLE "user_tmp"
AS
    SELECT
        OBJECT_CONSTRUCT(*) AS "obj"
    FROM "user";

CREATE TABLE "out_user"
AS
    SELECT
        trim("obj":"Id", '"')    AS "Id",
        trim("obj":"Name", '"')  AS "Name",
        trim("obj":"Email", '"') AS "Email",
        trim("obj":"Title", '"') AS "Title"
    FROM "user_tmp";

--order table
CREATE TABLE "order_tmp"
AS
    SELECT
        OBJECT_CONSTRUCT(*) AS "obj"
    FROM "order";

CREATE TABLE "out_order"
AS
    SELECT
        trim("obj":"Id", '"')            AS "Id",
        trim("obj":"IsDeleted", '"')     AS "IsDeleted",
        trim("obj":"AccountId", '"')     AS "AccountId",
        trim("obj":"OwnerId", '"')       AS "OwnerId",
        trim("obj":"OpportunityId", '"') AS "OpportunityId",
        trim("obj":"Name", '"')          AS "Name",
        trim("obj":"OrderNumber", '"')   AS "OrderNumber",
        trim("obj":"EffectiveDate", '"') AS "EffectiveDate",
        trim("obj":"EndDate", '"')       AS "EndDate",
        trim("obj":"Status", '"')        AS "Status"
    FROM "order_tmp";

--order table
CREATE TABLE "orderitem_tmp"
AS
    SELECT
        OBJECT_CONSTRUCT(*) AS "obj"
    FROM "orderitem";

CREATE TABLE "out_orderitem"
AS
    SELECT
        trim("obj":"Id", '"')              AS "Id",
        trim("obj":"IsDeleted", '"')       AS "IsDeleted",
        trim("obj":"Product2Id", '"')      AS "Product2Id",
        trim("obj":"OrderId", '"')         AS "OrderId",
        trim("obj":"ServiceDate", '"')     AS "ServiceDate",
        trim("obj":"EndDate", '"')         AS "EndDate",
        trim("obj":"Quantity", '"')        AS "Quantity",
        trim("obj":"UnitPrice", '"')       AS "UnitPrice",
        trim("obj":"CurrencyIsoCode", '"') AS "CurrencyIsoCode"
    FROM "orderitem_tmp";

--order table
CREATE TABLE "product2_tmp"
AS
    SELECT
        OBJECT_CONSTRUCT(*) AS "obj"
    FROM "product2";

CREATE TABLE "out_product2"
AS
    SELECT
        trim("obj":"Id", '"')     AS "Id",
        trim("obj":"Name", '"')   AS "Name",
        trim("obj":"Family", '"') AS "Family"
    FROM "product2_tmp";
configuration.name: Input Tables Creation

description: This Transformation checks for missing columns needed in the following Transformations, adding them to the output tables a populating them with NULL values if missing.
name: Input Tables Creation

queries:
--Generate list of 10000 consecutive dates (to the FUTURE), beginning by fixed date (2010-01-01)
--It's used for generating MRR rows
CREATE TABLE "dates"
AS
    SELECT
        DATEADD(
                DAY, /* simple DATE math */
                "seq"."seq", /* adding generated numbers from fixed date */
                "oldday"
            ) :: DATE AS "date"
    FROM (
             SELECT
                 '2010-01-01' AS "oldday" /* FIXED DATE */
         ) "t1"
             LEFT JOIN (
        SELECT
            seq2() AS "seq" /* SUBQUERY #1 */
        FROM TABLE (generator(ROWCOUNT => 10000)) /* - produce 10000 rows table with {0:9999} numbers */
    ) "seq"
    ORDER BY 1;

/*
--This can be used to remove rows of products which you don't want to include in MRR. You need to define such field in previous Transformations though.
--remove non-MRR rows
DELETE
FROM "contract_line"
WHERE "product_type" <> 'MRR';
*/

--fill missing end date values
UPDATE "contract_line"
SET "contract_line_end_date"=year(current_date) || '-12-31'
WHERE "contract_line_end_date" = '';

/*
--If you have costs in your data as well, you can include them in this transformation
UPDATE "contract_line"
SET "contract_line_cost"='0'
WHERE "contract_line_cost" = '';
*/

--prepare tmp table with marked max end date of single product in contract_line table, so we know for which row to create prediction if there is single product more than once
--that might happen when you're upselling/downgrading in the middle of the month.
CREATE TABLE "contract_line_tmp"
AS
    SELECT
        "l".*,
        "max_end"."max_end_date"
    FROM "contract_line" "l"
             LEFT JOIN (SELECT
                            "contract_id",
                            "product_id",
                            max("contract_line_end_date") AS "max_end_date"
                        FROM "contract_line"
                        GROUP BY 1, 2) AS "max_end"
                       ON "l"."contract_id" = "max_end"."contract_id"
                           AND "l"."product_id" = "max_end"."product_id"
                           AND "l"."contract_line_end_date" = "max_end"."max_end_date";

--creating PK
--add extra month per contract line and fill with zeroes, so we're abel to detect churn
--don't do that for products switching during single month - just end the ending one in that particular month
--use only (finished and) activated contracts for MRR calculation
--add fake months till end of the next year of future revenue for activated contracts
--if line is ending in december, alter join to end it in december next year
--if line of activated contract ended up in the past, don't predict it
CREATE TABLE "mrr_tmp"
AS
    SELECT DISTINCT
        "l"."contract_line_id" || '|' || left("d"."date", 7) || '-01' AS "mrr_id",
        "l"."contract_line_id",
        "l"."contract_id",
        "l"."product_id",
        "l"."contract_line_currency",
        "l"."contract_line_start_date",
        "l"."contract_line_end_date",
        left("d"."date", 7) || '-01'                                  AS "date",
        (CASE
            /*WHEN "date" > "l"."contract_line_end_date"
                AND ("c"."status" = 'Finished' OR "l"."max_end_date" IS NULL)
                THEN 0*/ --related to adding another status to the MRR, like status marking finished orders to calculate MRR in the past and cut the prediction when there is churn
             WHEN "date" > "l"."contract_line_end_date"
                 AND "c"."status" = 'Activated'
                 AND "l"."contract_line_end_date" < current_date
                 THEN 0
             WHEN last_day("date"::DATE) = iff("l"."contract_line_end_date" LIKE '%-12-31',
                                               dateadd(YEAR, 1, "l"."contract_line_end_date"),
                                               YEAR("l"."contract_line_end_date"::DATE) + 1 || '-12-31')
                 AND "status" = 'Activated'
                 AND "l"."max_end_date" IS NOT NULL
                 THEN 0
             ELSE "l"."contract_line_quantity"
         END)                                                         AS "contract_line_quantity",
        (CASE
            /*WHEN "date" > "l"."contract_line_end_date"
                AND ("c"."status" = 'Finished' OR "l"."max_end_date" IS NULL)
                THEN 0*/ --related to adding another status to the MRR, like status marking finished orders to calculate MRR in the past and cut the prediction when there is churn
             WHEN "date" > "l"."contract_line_end_date"
                 AND "c"."status" = 'Activated'
                 AND "l"."contract_line_end_date" < current_date
                 THEN 0
             WHEN last_day("date"::DATE) = iff("l"."contract_line_end_date" LIKE '%-12-31',
                                               dateadd(YEAR, 1, "l"."contract_line_end_date"),
                                               YEAR("l"."contract_line_end_date"::DATE) + 1 || '-12-31')
                 AND "status" = 'Activated'
                 AND "l"."max_end_date" IS NOT NULL
                 THEN 0
             ELSE "l"."contract_line_unit_price"
         END)                                                         AS "contract_line_unit_price"/*,
        --you can use this if you have costs in your data
        (CASE
             WHEN "date" > "l"."contract_line_end_date"
                 AND ("c"."status" = 'Finished' OR "l"."max_end_date" IS NULL)
                 THEN 0
             WHEN "date" > "l"."contract_line_end_date"
                 AND "c"."status" = 'Activated'
                 AND "l"."contract_line_end_date" < current_date
                 THEN 0
             WHEN last_day("date"::DATE) = iff("l"."contract_line_end_date" LIKE '%-12-31',
                                               dateadd(YEAR, 1, "l"."contract_line_end_date"),
                                               YEAR("l"."contract_line_end_date"::DATE) + 1 || '-12-31')
                 AND "status" = 'Activated'
                 AND "l"."max_end_date" IS NOT NULL
                 THEN 0
             ELSE "l"."contract_line_cost"
         END)                                                         AS "contract_line_cost"*/
    FROM "dates" "d"
             LEFT JOIN "contract_line_tmp" "l"
                       ON "d"."date" BETWEEN "l"."contract_line_start_date" AND
                           (CASE
                                WHEN "l"."contract_line_end_date" LIKE '%-12-31'
                                    AND "l"."max_end_date" IS NOT NULL
                                    AND "l"."contract_line_end_date" >= current_date
                                    THEN dateadd(YEAR, 1, "l"."contract_line_end_date")
                                WHEN "l"."max_end_date" IS NOT NULL
                                    AND "l"."contract_line_end_date" >= current_date
                                    THEN YEAR("l"."contract_line_end_date"::DATE) + 1 || '-12-31'
                                ELSE dateadd(MONTH, 1, "l"."contract_line_end_date"::DATE)
                            END)
             LEFT JOIN "contract" "c"
                       ON "l"."contract_id" = "c"."contract_id"
    WHERE "l"."contract_line_quantity" * "l"."contract_line_unit_price" > 0
      AND (left(to_date(dateadd(MONTH, 1, "c"."contract_end_date")), 7) >= left("d"."date", 7) OR
           "c"."status" = 'Activated')
      AND "c"."status" IN ('Activated'/*, 'Finished'*/) --you can add another status to be included in MRR calculation
;

--divide quantity when some lines start or end in the middle of the month
--mark prediction for future MRR
CREATE TABLE "mrr_tmp2"
AS
    SELECT
        "l"."mrr_id",
        "l"."contract_line_id",
        "l"."contract_id",
        "l"."product_id",
        "l"."contract_line_currency",
        "l"."contract_line_start_date",
        "l"."contract_line_end_date",
        "l"."date",
        iff(left("l"."date", 7) > left("l"."contract_line_end_date", 7) AND "c"."status" = 'Activated', 'true',
            'false')                         AS "mrr_prediction",
        "l"."contract_line_quantity" / (CASE
                                            WHEN left("l"."contract_line_start_date", 7) = left("l"."date", 7)
                                                AND "l"."contract_line_start_date" > "l"."date"
                                                THEN (datediff(DAY, "l"."date", last_day("l"."date"::DATE)) + 1) /
                                                     datediff(DAY, "l"."date", "l"."contract_line_start_date")
                                            WHEN left("l"."contract_line_end_date", 7) = left("l"."date", 7)
                                                AND "l"."contract_line_end_date" < last_day("l"."date"::DATE)
                                                THEN (datediff(DAY, "l"."date", last_day("l"."date"::DATE)) + 1) /
                                                     datediff(DAY, "l"."contract_line_end_date",
                                                              last_day("l"."date"::DATE))
                                            ELSE 1
                                        END) AS "contract_line_quantity",
        "l"."contract_line_unit_price"/*,
        "l"."contract_line_cost"*/
    FROM "mrr_tmp" "l"
             LEFT JOIN "contract" "c"
                       ON "l"."contract_id" = "c"."contract_id";

--output table
--caulculate previous values and fill zeroes for null results
CREATE TABLE "out_mrr"
AS
    SELECT
        "r".*,
        ifnull(lag("r"."contract_line_quantity")
                   OVER (PARTITION BY "r"."contract_line_id" ORDER BY "r"."date"),
               0) AS "previous_contract_line_quantity",
        ifnull(lag("r"."contract_line_unit_price")
                   OVER (PARTITION BY "r"."contract_line_id" ORDER BY "r"."date"),
               0) AS "previous_contract_line_unit_price"/*,
        ifnull(lag("r"."contract_line_cost")
                   OVER (PARTITION BY "r"."contract_line_id" ORDER BY "r"."date"),
               0) AS "previous_contract_line_cost"*/
    FROM "mrr_tmp2" "r";
configuration.name: MRR - Contract Line
